about_the_game:
Rogue Protocol is an immersive-sim action-adventure, open-world game set in a harsh and cold, half colonized planet, a world that is called Terra III, isolated, forgotten, in one of the uncharted systems.

You, as a newbie Freelancer stranded on this planet, will get to explore the vast world and face the terror of the global scale outbreak and proxy warfare known as Groundzeroes.

Finding a way to leave the planet is your ultimate goal, but with no credits and no backup it will be an arduous task.

Grind your way up, from the low-end jobs to the high-end operations provided by the warring factions or explore the world for the valuable goods abandoned in the conflict zones: fight, survive, loot, all in order to gain reputation and credits, granting yourself a chance to leave the Rogue Planet.

THE ROGUE PLANET.

The planet Terra III is in an isolated system formally in control of Union Earth Federation but the super corporations exploiting it are truly in charge, in the name of profit the entire planet was left wild, with no laws and no freedom leaving no chance to leave for those who settled with hope for a new life.

FEATURES.

  • A Moon-sized world featuring diverse biomes, spanning from sandy landscape to snowy mountain and even an open ocean, filled with natural and man-made structures with the ability to explore on foot, with ground or even with air vehicles.

  • Complex appearance customization for your Freelancer, armour, clothing, weapons and vehicles. You can go with style or choose to be tactical, it’s all up to you.

  • Freedom of choices to build your own career as a Freelancer, taking the endless jobs and operations to grant yourself the Reputation Point and make yourself known among the superpowers or going against them.

  • Detailed environment and highly interactive world to immerse yourself in.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of explicit violence and gore, use of drugs and alcohol, suicide act and suggestive theme. Some may find it disturbing and traumatic.

detailed_description:
Rogue Protocol is an immersive-sim action-adventure, open-world game set in a harsh and cold, half colonized planet, a world that is called Terra III, isolated, forgotten, in one of the uncharted systems.

You, as a newbie Freelancer stranded on this planet, will get to explore the vast world and face the terror of the global scale outbreak and proxy warfare known as Groundzeroes.

Finding a way to leave the planet is your ultimate goal, but with no credits and no backup it will be an arduous task.

The planet Terra III is in an isolated system formally in control of Union Earth Federation but the super corporations exploiting it are truly in charge, in the name of profit the entire planet was left wild, with no laws and no freedom leaving no chance to leave for those who settled with hope for a new life.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12.3
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 5500M 4GB
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12.3
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 14 Core GPU
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required

name: ROGUE PROTOCOL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4770K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB, AMD RX 5600 XT 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 10700K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 12GB, AMD RX 6600 XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required

short_description: Immerse yourself in the gigantic world filled with mysteries, violence and tension. Fight against mutants and armed forces, explore, join operations, do jobs, earn credits, buy, trade, upgrade and plan to escape from the rogue planet and its protocol!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
